QUESTION 3:  APPLICATION AND INTERPRETATION 
 
3.1 
Refer to points 3 and 4 on the orthophoto map.

orthophoto map. 
  
 
 
 
 
 
(1 x 1) 
 
 
(1)

(2)

identified in QUESTION 3.1.2.

(2)
